verses.verse: וַיְהִ֗י <S%H1961><s%> vay-Hi, came כְּכַלֹּתוֹ֙ <S%H3615><s%> ke-chal-lo-To And it came to pass when he had made an end לְדַבֵּ֣ר <S%H1696><s%> le-dab-Ber of speaking אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to שָׁא֔וּל <S%H7586><s%> sha-'Ul, unto Saul וְנֶ֙פֶשׁ֙ <S%H5315><s%> ve-Ne-fesh that the soul יְה֣וֹנָתָ֔ן <S%H3083><s%> ye-Ho-na-Tan, of Jonathan נִקְשְׁרָ֖ה <S%H7194><s%> nik-she-Rah was knit בְּנֶ֣פֶשׁ <S%H5315><s%> be-Ne-fesh with the soul דָּוִ֑ד <S%H1732><s%> da-Vid; of David; וַיֶּאֱהָבֹו vai-ye-'e-ha-vov כוַיֶּאֱהָבֵ֥הוּ <S%H157><s%> vai-ye-'e-ha-Ve-hu loved קיְהוֹנָתָ֖ן <S%H3083><s%> ye-ho-na-Tan and Jonathan כְּנַפְשֽׁוֹ׃ <S%H5315><s%> ke-naf-Sho. him as his own soul

וַיִּקָּחֵ֥הוּ <S%H3947><s%> vai-yik-ka-Che-hu took שָׁא֖וּל <S%H7586><s%> sha-'Ul And Saul בַּיּ֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> bai-Yom him that day הַה֑וּא <S%H1931><s%> ha-Hu; he וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> ve-Lo and did not נְתָנ֔וֹ <S%H5414><s%> ne-ta-No, and would let לָשׁ֖וּב <S%H7725><s%> la-Shuv him go no more home בֵּ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> beit house אָבִֽיו׃ <S%H1><s%> 'a-Viv. to his father's

וַיִּכְרֹ֧ת <S%H3772><s%> vai-yich-Rot made יְהוֹנָתָ֛ן <S%H3083><s%> ye-ho-na-Tan Then Jonathan וְדָוִ֖ד <S%H1732><s%> ve-da-Vid and David בְּרִ֑ית <S%H1285><s%> be-Rit; a covenant בְּאַהֲבָת֥וֹ <S%H160><s%> be-'a-ha-va-To because he loved אֹת֖וֹ <S%H853><s%> o-To כְּנַפְשֽׁוֹ׃ <S%H5315><s%> ke-naf-Sho. him as his own soul

וַיִּתְפַּשֵּׁ֣ט <S%H6584><s%> vai-yit-pash-Shet stripped יְהוֹנָתָ֗ן <S%H3083><s%> ye-ho-na-Tan, And Jonathan אֶֽת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַמְּעִיל֙ <S%H4598><s%> ham-me-'Il himself of the robe אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher after עָלָ֔יו <S%H5921><s%> 'a-Lav, and וַֽיִּתְּנֵ֖הוּ <S%H5414><s%> vai-yit-te-Ne-hu that [was] upon him and gave לְדָוִ֑ד <S%H1732><s%> le-da-Vid; it to David וּמַדָּ֕יו <S%H4055><s%> u-mad-Dav and his garments וְעַד־ <S%H5704><s%> ve-'ad- including חַרְבּ֥וֹ <S%H2719><s%> char-Bo even to his sword וְעַד־ <S%H5704><s%> ve-'ad- including קַשְׁתּ֖וֹ <S%H7198><s%> kash-To and to his bow וְעַד־ <S%H5704><s%> ve-'ad- including חֲגֹרֽוֹ׃ <S%H2290><s%> cha-go-Ro. and his belt

וַיֵּצֵ֨א <S%H3318><s%> vai-ye-Tze went out דָוִ֜ד <S%H1732><s%> da-Vid And David בְּכֹל֩ <S%H3605><s%> be-Chol of all אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher after יִשְׁלָחֶ֤נּוּ <S%H7971><s%> yish-la-Chen-nu sent שָׁאוּל֙ <S%H7586><s%> sha-'Ul whithersoever Saul יַשְׂכִּ֔יל <S%H7919><s%> yas-Kil, him [and] behaved himself wisely וַיְשִׂמֵ֣הוּ <S%H7760><s%> vay-si-Me-hu set שָׁא֔וּל <S%H7586><s%> sha-'Ul, and Saul עַ֖ל <S%H5921><s%> 'al over אַנְשֵׁ֣י <S%H582><s%> 'an-Shei him over the men הַמִּלְחָמָ֑ה <S%H4421><s%> ham-mil-cha-Mah; of war וַיִּיטַב֙ <S%H3190><s%> vai-yi-Tav and he was accepted בְּעֵינֵ֣י <S%H5869><s%> be-'ei-Nei in the sight כָל־ <S%H3605><s%> chol of all הָעָ֔ם <S%H5971><s%> ha-'Am, of all the people וְגַ֕ם <S%H1571><s%> ve-Gam and also בְּעֵינֵ֖י <S%H5869><s%> be-'ei-Nei and also in the sight עַבְדֵ֥י <S%H5650><s%> 'av-Dei servants שָׁאֽוּל׃ <S%H7586><s%> sha-'Ul. of Saul's פ Peh
